short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open simple and thumbnail-free new tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
️⬇️Easy to set up⬇️:

1. Install the extension.
2. That’s all, whenever you will open a new tab in Chrome it will be blank and thumbnail free.

✨Features ✨

1. New tabs display a blank page 📄 instead of the usual new tab page with thumbnails.
2. Plain, less noisy, and simple new tab.
3. Dark mode support.

With this extension and you wouldn’t have to worry which recently visited pages show up on the new tab page.
